title: Fluffy's Flight
description: Endless arcade game featuring a Fluffy baby parrot's descent
longDescription: Fluffy's Flight is a charming arcade game that takes players on an endless descent with Fluffy, an adorable baby parrot, as it overcomes its fear of heights. Inspired by the core mechanics of Helix Jump, players swipe to rotate a 3D tree structure, guiding Fluffy through safe openings while avoiding broken bricks and gaps. Developed using Unity, I handled the complete game development cycle, from concept to deployment, including implementing physics-based movement, procedural level generation, and integrating multi-platform login, cloud save, and real-time leaderboards. The game also features monetization through Unity LevelPlay with IronSource and ad placements. Published successfully on the Google Play Store, Fluffy's Flight combines immersive gameplay, colorful visuals, and relaxing music to offer a skill-based, addictive experience suitable for all ages.

title: TaskFlow Mobile
description: Cross-platform productivity app with real-time collaboration
longDescription: A comprehensive task management application built with React Native and TypeScript. Features real-time collaboration, offline sync, custom animations, push notifications, and intelligent task prioritization using machine learning algorithms. TaskFlow Mobile aims to revolutionize how teams manage their daily tasks, offering a seamless and intuitive user experience. It integrates with popular calendar apps and provides detailed analytics on productivity trends.

title: Analytics Dashboard Pro
description: Modern data visualization dashboard with real-time updates
longDescription: A sophisticated analytics dashboard built with React, TypeScript, and MUI. Features real-time data visualization, customizable widgets, advanced filtering, export capabilities, and responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices. This dashboard is ideal for businesses needing quick insights into their data, offering powerful charting options with D3.js and WebSocket integration for live updates. It's designed for scalability and easy integration with existing data sources.

title: Retro Arcade Collection
description: HTML5 games built with Construct 2 engine
longDescription: A collection of classic arcade-style games recreated using Construct 2. Includes Pac-Man inspired maze runner, Tetris-like puzzle game, and Space Invaders clone. All games feature modern graphics, sound effects, and mobile-responsive controls, providing a nostalgic yet fresh gaming experience directly in your browser. Each game is meticulously crafted to retain the charm of the originals while introducing quality-of-life improvements.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with admin panel
longDescription: A complete e-commerce platform built with React frontend and Java Spring Boot backend. Features product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, order management, inventory tracking, and comprehensive admin dashboard. This scalable solution is designed for small to medium businesses looking to establish a robust online presence. It includes secure user authentication, order fulfillment workflows, and detailed sales reports.

title: AR Furniture Visualizer
description: Augmented reality app for furniture placement
longDescription: An innovative AR application built with Unity and ARCore/ARKit that allows users to visualize furniture in their real-world environment. Features 3D model library, realistic lighting, measurement tools, and social sharing capabilities. This app transforms the furniture shopping experience by letting users 'try before they buy' directly in their homes, ensuring a perfect fit and aesthetic match.
